posts.post_content:
Looking to buy a Harry Howell Portrait in PSA 6, 6.5 or 7 grade with no qualifiers.  Any back is fine.  


The pop report says there are 50 of these out there which fit this criteria.  Likely a needle in a haystack ask (like my green Cobb ask that took 18 months) but if you have one feel free to PM or email [url]tbrambo@yahoo.com[/url].

Thanks!!
Bill Brodhead probably has it in a 6

[quote name="Bobbycee" post=2136774]Bill Brodhead probably has it in a 6[/QUOTE]

Bill probably has every card in a six.  :)
